title: function to read data from relational databases hosted by online MS SQL server. The user needs to have read access to the database et should install the appropriate MS driver that is compatible with the SQLServer version — read_from_ms_sql_server
code: read_from_ms_sql_server(   user,   password,   host,   port,   database.name,   driver.name,   table.name,   records = NULL,   fields = NULL,   id.position = 1 )

title: function to read data from relational databases hosted by online MS SQL server. The user needs to have read access to the database et should install the appropriate MS driver that is compatible with the SQLServer version — read_from_ms_sql_server
text: user user name password user password host name host server port port ID database.name name database contains table data pulled driver.name name MS driver. use odbc::odbcListDrivers() display list installed drivers table.name name target table records vector comma-separated string subset subject IDs. specified, records correspond subjects imported. fields vector comma-separated string column names. provided, columns imported id.position column position variable unique identifies subjects. specified column subject IDs first column. default 1.

title: function to read data from REDCap — read_from_redcap

what: Function to import epidemiology-related data from different sources into R — readepi
title: Function to import epidemiology-related data from different sources into R — readepi
text: function wrapper around numerous functions used import data stored database management systems (DBMS) including relational NoSQL databases. also contains functions import data common file types csv, txt, xlsx, xml, json, etc.

title: Function to import epidemiology-related data from different sources into R — readepi
code: readepi(   credentials.file = NULL,   file.path = NULL,   sep = NULL,   format = NULL,   which = NULL,   pattern = NULL,   project.id = NULL,   driver.name = NULL,   table.name = NULL,   records = NULL,   fields = NULL,   id.position = 1 )

title: Function to import epidemiology-related data from different sources into R — readepi
text: credentials.file path file user-specific credential details projects interest. required importing data DBMS. tab-delimited file following columns: user_name: user name password: user password (REDCap, corresponds token serves password project) host_name: host name (relational DB) URI (NoSQL DB REDCap) project_id: project ID name database access . comment: summary description project database interest dbms: name DBMS: 'redcap' 'REDCap' reading REDCap, 'sqlserver' 'SQLServer' reading MS SQLServer port: port ID (used MS SQLServers) file.path path file read. several files need imported directory, path directory sep separator columns file. required space-separated files. format string used specify file format. useful file extension, file extension match actual type string used specify objects extracted (name excel sheet import) pattern specified, files suffix imported specified directory project.id relational DB, name database contains table data pulled. Otherwise, project ID given access . driver.name name MS driver. use odbc::odbcListDrivers() display list installed drivers table.name name target table records vector comma-separated string subset subject IDs. specified, records correspond subjects imported. fields vector comma-separated string column names. provided, columns imported. id.position column position variable unique identifies subjects. specified column subject IDs first column. default 1.

title: Function to import epidemiology-related data from different sources into R — readepi
text: list 2 data frames (data metadata) reading REDCap. data frame otherwise.
